channel.title: Webclient in Linux
channel.description: For some reason, when i try to load a webclient in Ubuntu Linux, It says "Error loading, Please report" I'm pretty sure, that's because its trying to download the cache into C:\ , and it cant, Because its Linux. Is that right? Also, Is there an easy way to fix this Without having to go into the client files? Not saying i cant do it, i'm just too lazy :P

item.title: Webclient in Linux
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

For some reason, when i try to load a webclient in Ubuntu Linux, It says “Error loading, Please report”
I’m pretty sure, that’s because its trying to download the cache into C:\ , and it cant, Because its Linux.
Is that right?
Also, Is there an easy way to fix this Without having to go into the client files? Not saying i cant do it, i’m just too lazy

Read full topic
